fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of space to surround each carousel item with.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The background color for each carousel item.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate of each carousel item.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of each carousel item's [Material].

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The highlight color to indicate the carousel items are in pressed, hovered or focused states.

fields.name: shrinkExtent
fields.desc: The minimum allowable extent (size) in the main axis for carousel items during scrolling transitions.

fields.name: itemSnapping
fields.desc: Whether the carousel should keep scrolling to the next/previous items to maintain the original layout.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: An object that can be used to control the position to which this scroll view is scrolled.

fields.name: scrollDirection
fields.desc: The [Axis] along which the scroll view's offset increases with each item.

fields.name: reverse
fields.desc: Whether the carousel list scrolls in the reading direction.

fields.name: consumeMaxWeight
fields.desc: Whether the collapsed items are allowed to expand to the max size.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when one of the [children] is tapped.

fields.name: enableSplash
fields.desc: Determines whether an [InkWell] will cover each Carousel item.

fields.name: itemExtent
fields.desc: The extent the children are forced to have in the main axis.

fields.name: flexWeights
fields.desc: The weights that each visible child should occupy in the viewport.

fields.name: children
fields.desc: The child widgets for the carousel.

nodes.name: CarouselView Basic Usage
desc: 【itemExtent】 : Forced size in the main axis direction 【double】
